dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on identifying any suspicious behavior from Bob or Charlie to increase our chances of discovering the assassin among us. Let's keep an open mind and share any concerns we might have.

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.message: I agree with Alice's suggestion to focus on suspicious behavior. However, I'll try my best to blend in and not draw attention to myself. Let's all remain vigilant and keep an open line of communication.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
